subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4.4 Maven Deployment
msgSnippet: Hi All, Any chance that JUnit 4.4 can be added to the Maven 2 Repository? Just checked http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/junit/junit/ and we re only up to 4.3 at
messageBody:
Hi All,

Any chance that JUnit 4.4 can be added to the Maven 2 Repository? Just
checked http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/junit/junit/ and we're only up to 4.3
at this stage.

Keep up the great work!

Cheers
Casey
